DOC.brief_summary: The effects of hydrocortisone on cognition will be investigated.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Hydrocortisone on Social Cognition and Memory
DOC.detailed_description: 80 healthy young individuals (40 females and 40 male) will be recruited an randomized to either placebo or 10 mg hydrocortisone before testing. Tasks will on emotion recognition, memory and cognitive flexibilty will be conducted.
DOC.criteria: age 18 30 medication free any medication severe ilness
